```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
```

```{r ggally_diagAxis, cache = TRUE}
data(tips, package = "reshape")
 ggally_diagAxis(tips, ggplot2::aes(x=tip))
 ggally_diagAxis(tips, ggplot2::aes(x=sex))



```
